channel.title: No response from server pi
channel.description: Hi, i need help i've portforwarded port checker says my port is online and status checker is saying my server is online but when i try to connect with client it says no response from server please try connecting..... Any help please ? if you want my tv pm me i also had same probem on my vps so i moved on with a vpn and tried it on there but same problem =s

item.title: No response from server pi
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Lil_Smok3r:

Check if you have editted the ip’s in client.java (Client Sided)

Explained with more simplicity:
Because this is your personal client, the connect IPs must be set to localhost, or “127.0.0.1”
If you are going to distribute this client, make a duplicate of your personal client, and change the connect IPs to whatever IP the client is connecting to.

Read full topic

item.title: No response from server pi

item.description:
